name: Hexa Connect 3D
description:
Hexa Connect is brought to you by Popcore, makers of hit puzzle games with more than 250 million combined downloads!

Hexa Connect is a fun and addictive math puzzle game. It’s more than just numbers, it’s a brain teaser that will take you to the next level!

Connect all the matching number hexes with a satisfying “pop”, and watch as they add up to bigger and bigger numbers! Every move you make in this puzzle game fills up your bar, and once it reaches the top, you’ve beaten the level! That’s not it, though… the goals get higher and higher, so you’ll eventually need some aid from the puzzle helpers. That’s when you can shuffle, swipe and double your way to puzzle victory with Hexa Connect! In this fun and colorful game, you challenge your logic and math skills, critical thinking, and precision.

WITH HEXA CONNECT YOU CAN
▶ PLAY the full Puzzle Board game experience offline and on the go.
▶ SWIPE to connect the hexes and fill up your bar.
▶ SHUFFLE the board so your numbers are lined up.
▶ CUSTOMIZE your puzzle board with different themes.
▶ REACH the top!

WHY PLAY HEXA CONNECT?
▶ RELIEVE your stress.
▶ TEASE your brain with the satisfying pops.
▶ PRACTICE your math!
▶ LEARN the tricks to ensure Hexa Connect glory!
▶ ENJOY cool skins and themes to customize your journey!

What are you waiting for? Challenge your brain with this tricky game right now!
